title: Font substitution
content:
Hi,

Can anybody suggest a substitute for this:

[https://www.fontfont.com/fonts/cst-berlin-west/medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720163916/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.fontfont.com/fonts/cst-berlin-west/medium)

I have been told that I need to find something with our existing collection of 2000+ fonts, so sadly purchasing is not an option.

I've used a couple of apps to see if their suggestions are suitable, but something is always a bit off (usually the 'a').

Thanks
author: brownienz

comments.content:
Is $89 really too much for such a particular design, of seven styles?

hhp
I don't think so, especially after reading this [http://typophile.com/node/48785](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720163916/http:/typophile.com/node/48785). But I have no financial delegations.
